settings.liquid:
INTRODUCING MY EZYDOG

Your new personalised member hub!

We've completely revamped our member profile section to bring you exciting new features and a smoother experience. Sign in or create an account to unlock your personalised EzyDog experience. Manage your orders, track deliveries, save your favourite products, and get early access to exclusive offers and new gear. We’ve got lots of exciting features in the works - so stay tuned for more ways to get rewarded, manage returns, and make your experience even more awesome!

LOGIN/SIGN UP

settings.title: PROFILE
settings.content: Easily manage your contact info and addresses. Keeping your details up to date means faster checkouts, smoother re-orders, and more time with your pet!

settings.title: BIRTHDAY
settings.content: We’ll send you exclusive offers and surprises to celebrate special moments like your dog’s birthday.

settings.title: SIZING INFO
settings.content: Improved assistance and personalised gear recommendations based on your dog’s breed and size.

Profile: Complete their profile to 100% andwe’ll reward you with a unique code for $20 off when you spend $100.
Birthday: We’ll send you exclusive offers and surprises to celebrate special moments like your dog’s birthday.
Sizing Info: Improved assistance and personalised gear recommendations based on your dog’s breed and size.
Easily manage your contact info and addresses. Keeping your details up to date means faster checkouts, smoother re-orders, and more time with your pet!
Add your pet’s info to get birthday surprises and personalised gear recommendations based on their breed and size - because every dog deserves the perfect fit!

Easily view all your past EzyDog purchases in one convenient place. Plus - we're working on bringing you even more flexibility, with the option to lodge returns directly through this page coming soon.
View exactly what you’ve purchased before, making re-ordering your dog’s favourite gear a breeze. No more second-guessing sizes or digging through old emails.

TERMS & CONDITIONS
1. One-Time Reward: The $20 discount code offer applies only to the first pet profile you complete to 100%. Additional pet profiles are not eligible for further rewards.
2. Minimum Spend: A minimum spend of $100 AUD (excluding shipping) is required in order to redeem the $20 discount code.
3. Unique Discount Code: You will receive a unique discount code via email once your first pet’s profile reaches 100% completion. This code must be entered at checkout to apply the discount.
4. Expiry: The discount code is valid for 3 months from the date of issue. After this time, it will expire and cannot be reissued or extended.
5. Non-Transferable & Single Use: The discount code is single-use only and cannot be transferred, exchanged for cash, or used in conjunction with other promotional codes.
6. EzyDog Australia Only: Offer valid for use on the EzyDog Australia website only (ezydog.com.au) and for Australian customers.

settings.liquid:
TERMS & CONDITIONS
MY EZYDOG - PET PROFILES

1. Eligibility:
• Open to all myezydog account holders.
• Customer must be opted into email marketing in order to receive discount code once pet profile is complete.

1. One-Time Reward:
The $20 credit offer applies only to the first pet profile you complete to 100%. Additional pet profiles are not eligible for further rewards.

2. Minimum Spend:
A minimum spend of $100 AUD (excluding shipping) is required in order to redeem the $20 credit.

3. Unique Discount Code:
You will receive a unique discount code via email once your first pet’s profile reaches 100% completion. This code must be entered at checkout to apply the discount.

4. Expiry:
The discount code is valid for 3 months from the date of issue. After this time, it will expire and cannot be reissued or extended.

5. Non-Transferable & Single Use:
The discount code is single-use only and cannot be transferred, exchanged for cash, or used in conjunction with other promotional codes.

6. EzyDog Australia Only:
Offer valid for use on the EzyDog Australia website only (ezydog.com.au) and for Australian customers.

settings.question: Do you ship overseas?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship all over the world. Shipping costs will apply, and will be added at checkout. We run discounts and promotions all year, so stay tuned for exclusive deals.

settings.question: How long will it take to get my orders?
settings.answer: It depends on where you are. Orders processed here will take 5-7 business days to arrive. Overseas deliveries can take anywhere from 7-16 days. Delivery details will be provided in your confirmation email.

settings.question: Any question?
settings.answer: You can contact us through our contact page! We will be happy to assist you.
